text:
Any person applying to the Board of Supervisors for appointment to a board, commission, committee, task force, or other body, shall submit, in addition to any other information required as part of the application process, a written statement under penalty of perjury disclosing any felony convictions. 
     These requirements shall not apply to mayoral nominations to boards and commissions submitted to the Board of Supervisors pursuant to Charter Section 
3.100(16). 
(Added by Ord. 213-00, File No. 001103, App. 9/8/2000)
